com.inet.editor
Enum BaseEditorToolBar.DEFAULT_COMPONENTS

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<BaseEditorToolBar.DEFAULT_COMPONENTS>
      com.inet.editor.BaseEditorToolBar.DEFAULT_COMPONENTS
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BaseEditorToolBar.DEFAULT_COMPONENTS>
Enclosing class:
BaseEditorToolBar
public static enum BaseEditorToolBar.DEFAULT_COMPONENTS
extends java.lang.Enum<BaseEditorToolBar.DEFAULT_COMPONENTS>

These are the names of the default components of the tool bar of the BaseEditor.

Enum Constant Summary
btnAddImage
          The JButton to add an image at the current position
btnAlignCenter
          The JToggleButton to center the contents of the selected paragraph(s)
btnAlignJustify
          The JToggleButton to justify the contents of the selected paragraph(s)
btnAlignLeft
          The JToggleButton to align the contents of the selected paragraph(s) to the left
btnAlignRight
          The JToggleButton to align the contents of the selected paragraph(s) to the right
btnAutoSpellCheck
          The JToggleButton to enable/disable the automatic spell checking
btnBold
          The JButton to toggle the bold font property
btnChangeFormat
          The JButton to toggle the format between HTML and plain text
btnCheckSpelling
          The JButton to start the spell checking
btnFind
          The JButton to open a search dialog for the contents of the editor
btnHorizontalRule
          The JButton to insert a horizontal rule
btnHyperlink
          The JButton to add or modify a hyperlink
btnIndentDecrease
          The JButton to decrease the indent of the selected paragraph(s)
btnIndentIncrease
          The JButton to increase the indent of the selected paragraph(s)
btnItalic
          The JToggleButton to toggle the italic font property
btnOrderedList
          The JButton to create an ordered list
btnRedo
          The JButton to redo the latest undone action
btnUnderline
          The JToggleButton to toggle the underline font property
btnUndo
          The JButton to undo the last action
btnUnorderedList
          The JToggleButton to create an unordered list
cmbFontFamily
          The font family JComboBox
cmbFontSize
          The font size JComboBox
ddbFontColor
          The ColorButton to change the font color
